summary: Defines Django model classes used in tests to demonstrate custom database column and table naming, including field-level db_column overrides, model-level db_table overrides, and a many-to-many relationship with a custom through table, each providing a readable string representation.
business_intent: Illustrate and verify that developers can map model fields and tables to legacy or nonâ€‘standard database names while keeping the ORM API unchanged, supporting migration or integration scenarios.
